text: Carious teeth - Coarse facial features - Congenital onset - Fair hair - Hepatomegaly - Hip dysplasia - Intellectual disability, mild - Long philtrum - Low-set ears - Microcephaly - Motor delay - Neutropenia - Nystagmus - Ocular albinism - Periodontitis - Photophobia - Posteriorly rotated ears - Pulmonary fibrosis - Recurrent bacterial infections - Reduced visual acuity - Smooth philtrum - Splenomegaly - Strabismus - Thrombocytopenia - Upslanted palpebral fissure - Visual impairment - Wide nasal
